Name: Axiom Alternative II
About the game: Story Following on from episode I, the protagonist starts the day by discovering that Grendel is keeping him under almost surveillance. The day gets worse when he has to fire an employee of a local hotel, who's twisted fact promptly appear on Grendel's malicious web based gossip column Deciding to take action before the problem gets any worse, the protagonist visits other victims, all the while devising a plan to stop Grendel. Features Funny and dramatic continuing short story by Redewaan Duckett Accessibility options now include the ability to see which of the major routes was taken
